title: OTG-Nilboard
content:
OTG-Nilboard

This project is exclusively for Android smartphones only. I've made this keyboard app that does nothing so that bluetooth and OTG physical keyboard users would be able to hide the Android smartphone's on-screen keyboard.

OTG-Nilboard keyboard literally does nothing and is purposively made for bluetooth and/or OTG keyboard users as mentioned previously.



Download

FileDescription
otg-nilboard.apk

Unsigned APK file for Android devices. (Only tested on Android 9 to 11).

otg-nilboard-source.zip

OTG-Nilboard's complete little code base compressed in a zip file.
